name: Ninja-Firefighter: Way of the Water Blade
name_original: Ninja-Firefighter: Way of the Water Blade
description:
Put out fires and rescue puppies from burning buildings in: 

Ninja Firefighter: Way of the Water Blade

Made for TriJam 207, we went over the 3 hour time limit, by quite a lot in the end!

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move.

Spacebar to Jump (and double jump).

Z to Dash.

Credits:

Code by Luke Archbell
